data.eml:eml: A review of the Cholevinae from the island of Borneo (Coleoptera, Leiodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schilthuizen, Menno, Perreau, Michel, Njunjic, Iva (2018): A review of the Cholevinae from the island of Borneo (Coleoptera, Leiodidae). ZooKeys 777: 57-108, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.777.23212, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.777.23212
